subject: warranty service
description_text:
Hi, I recently purchased two VAM motors. Order #SSN1729

One of the motors stopped working. I've tested it in every way, plugged it
into all the controller ports, but it still doesn't work.

How do I proceed with warranty service?

conversations.body_text: Hi Iago Leal,  Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and address, and we will send you a replacement free of charge. Also, please upgrade to SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0, make sure not to set the VAM strength too high, and avoid using the continuous vibration telemetry function.

Thank you, I will do that.

*name*: iago de carvalho leal
*Order *#SSN1729

Shipping address:

Iago leal

Rua C 316

60743-235 Fortaleza Ceará

Brazil

85997667464

Em ter., 12 de ago. de 2025 às 02:02, service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> escreveu:

> Hi Iago Leal,
>
> Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and address,
> and we will send you a replacement free of charge. Also, please upgrade to
> SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0, make sure not to set the VAM strength too high, and
> avoid using the continuous vibration telemetry function.
>
>
>
Hi Iago Leal,    We have sent you Vam Haptics, which is your logistics tracking link. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2522600705351197
